remarks: The value of the preimage mapping operator can be restricted to preimages in the base set of the topology.  Cf. ~ orvcval (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orvccel.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) $.
orvccel.2 $e |- ( ph -> J e. Top ) $.
orvccel.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( S MblFnM ( sigaGen ` J ) ) ) $.
orvccel.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
orvcval4 $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = ( `' X " { y e. U. J | y R A } ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d J y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
